body: Animals, elementals, fey, and plants are magically able to understand you when you speak Druidic, as if you were using speak with animals or tongues. If speaking to creatures of different types at the same time, you can allow all of them to understand you or speak understandably to just one type at a time. For example, if speaking to a group of animals and fey, you can make yourself understandable to all of them, just to the animals, or just to the fey.
name: Tongue of the Land
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Hierophant/Hierophant Features/1st-Tier Hierophant Path Abilities/Tongue of the Land
